scenes.background: You decide to gather data on market trends. [Bob] looks thoughtful.
scenes.description: [Bob] says, 'Do you think you can handle both the data and helping us refine the slides?'

options.text: I'll do my best to juggle both tasks, but we might need to prioritize.
options.analysis: You demonstrate a balanced approach, showing social skills and self-regulation, but your motivation to dive deep into both tasks seems limited.

options.text: Sure, I'll start with the data and then switch to the slides. It might delay things a bit.
options.analysis: You show high social skills and emotional perception, but might overextend yourself, affecting your empathy and self-regulation.

options.text: Can we focus on refining the slides first? I think the data can wait.
options.analysis: You exhibit strong self-regulation and a focus on the immediate task, but your emotional perception and empathy might be viewed as lower.
